title: Fragment, 18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Fragment of elaborate coral shapes. Pattern outlined by cordonnet and connected by brides picotées, interspersed by portes and gaze quadrillée.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-238-b.
